pages.text: $(li)The Spiked Turtle Shell is a bit better than the $(l:patchouli:armors/glowstone_armor)Glowstone Helmet$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:armors/molten_armor)Molten Helmet$(/l).$(br)$(li)It has Armour Toughness giving you an extra protection from strong attacks.

pages.name: Spiked Turtle Shell
pages.text: It has $(l:patchouli:potions/alexsmobs/knockback_resistance)Knockback Resistance$(/l) too, avoiding that other creatures would push you away.
